name: Honora
description:
Originally a 1 month solo student work, here is Honora ! 
An environnemental puzzle game prototype in which i putted a lot of effort to learn and improve in the way of
Game Design and Creation.

Inspired by Beyond: Two Soul, the game is about a ghost, Honora, who came back from the beyond to finished what she started so she can go in peace.

In this prototype you will play as a ghost with a lot of spiritual power... It allows you to mind control persons, move objects and... kill. Unfortunaterly, you are bound to the young girl and you need to figure out how to help her with all you got !

Do not hesitate to leave me a comment, feedbacks or some other great stuff ! See you soon ! :D

(Edit: The game is in French as I didn't have the time for a translation. Sorry about this, I hope you will enjoy it anyway!)
